snippet.title: Life Forge | Official Trailer 2017
snippet.description:
Life Forge is a free Indie Online Role Playing Game with active developers and a growing community. Create your character and enter the vast world, exploring, harvesting resources, crafting gear, and even taking part in PvP action!

The game is playable now in an Alpha state and is soon going to be on put up on Steam Greenlight! Be sure to get as much info as you can at http://www.lifeforgerpg.com/index.php?portal/

You can support this project on Kickstarter now!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1693546922/life-forge-orpg


~Life Forge Team
